column5: For years, the sea has been a source of food and transport for commerce, but also a source of mystery about the processes that take place within it. The vast majority of the seas have not been studied – from the coastline to the abyssal depths, from the molecular mechanisms of life within the cell to the myriad, complex and dynamic marine ecosystems.The Eastern Mediterranean is a unique part of the global ocean. The City of Haifa as a harbor city nestled at the edge of this sea has become a center for researchers and a source of knowledge.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
